snippet: When Paul Ryan, speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives, talks of social mobility, about helping struggling Americans move out of impoverished areas to give them greater opportunity, Shiva Daniels is the kind of person he has in mind....

headline.main: Turkey's Erdogan Compares German Behavior With Nazi Period
headline.print_headline: Turkey's Erdogan Compares German Behavior With Nazi Period

lead_paragraph: When Paul Ryan, speaker of the U.S. House of Representatives, talks of social mobility, about helping struggling Americans move out of impoverished areas to give them greater opportunity, Shiva Daniels is the kind of person he has in mind.
